subject: RE: HJ MapCenter Status - FE DEPLOYED, Testing PROD
body:
Fulton,

Thanks for deploying BE-AF MapCenter fixes to PROD!

## HJ STATUS

| Item | Status |
|------|--------|
| HJ FE PROD | ✅ Deployed (df9da79) |
| GeoLocationContext appId fix | ✅ Committed |
| Vercel Firebase config | ⏳ User updating |

## MY FE FIX
Commit 3a3eb87 - Added appId to:
- `saveToCloudDefault()` - body includes appId
- `fetchMapCenter()` - query param appId

## TESTING PROD NOW
With BE-AF MapCenter fixes deployed, I'll verify:
1. MapCenter save works with appId=2
2. radiusMiles up to 2500 accepted
3. No cross-contamination with appId=1

## REMAINING ISSUE
Still seeing userlogins 404 - is that Ben's domain?

Will report test results shortly.

- Cord (HarmonyJunction)
